[vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” css=”.vc_custom_1703318097649{margin-top: -200px !important;background-position: 0 0 !important;background-repeat: repeat !important;}”][vc_column][vc_row_inner equal_height=”yes” el_class=”shadow-box”][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″]Where Living Meets Solutions[vc_column_text]

Home Theatres

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″][vc_column_text]Only one thing beats going to the cinema and that’s having one in your own home!

Home theaters are dedicated spaces in homes equipped with audio and visual equipment designed to replicate a cinema-like experience. They typically include a large screen or projector, surround sound speakers, comfortable seating, and often incorporate acoustic treatments to enhance sound quality. Home theaters allow individuals to enjoy movies, TV shows, and gaming in a more immersive and high-quality environment within the comfort of their own homes.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” css=”.vc_custom_1534249300597{margin-top: 60px !important;margin-bottom: 80px !important;padding-top: 60px !important;padding-bottom: 60px !important;background: #f5f5f5 url(https://futuretechliving.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2018/04/vertical-lines-3.png?id=10096) !important;background-position: 0 0 !important;background-repeat: repeat !important;}”][vc_column el_class=”animate”][vc_media_grid element_width=”3″ gap=”0″ grid_id=”vc_gid:1704352304751-a1a9a666ff598cfde2900cbd6eafc207-4″ include=”13885,13886,13887,13888,13889,13890,13891″][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css=”.vc_custom_1534249583449{padding-top: 0px !important;padding-bottom: 80px !important;}”][vc_column]

Quality Service

[/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″]

Certified Professionals

Trained experts dedicated to delivering trusted and top-tier living solutions.

[/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row disable_element=”yes” css=”.vc_custom_1703227162511{margin-top: 0px !important;}”][vc_column el_class=”animate”]

Nicole Pratt

Team Member

Highly recommend their service!

When my husband and I were looking for a new media wall design, we knew it had to be Future Tech Living Solutions. They created the most modern design that can blend in with any surrounding. The installation process was seamless and they really made our old house feel brand new. Highly recommend their service!

[/vc_column][/vc_row]
